entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Matapedia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:09 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 6 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
